id.description: Unique identifier for the unsubscribe group.

description.description: Brief description of the unsubscribe group.

last_email_sent_at.description: Timestamp for the last email sent to this unsubscribe group.

is_default.description: Indicates if the group is the default one for unsubscribes.

unsubscribes.description: List of email addresses that have unsubscribed from this group.
